body.gathalast: Ekaṃ atthapadaṃ seyyo, yaṃ sutvā upasammati.
Ekaṃ gāthāpadaṃ seyyo, yaṃ sutvā upasammati.
Ekaṃ dhammapadaṃ seyyo, yaṃ sutvā upasammati.
body.gatha1: Yo sahassaṃ sahassena, saṅgāme mānuse jine;
Attā have jitaṃ seyyo, yā cāyaṃ itarā pajā;
Neva devo na gandhabbo, na māro saha brahmunā;
Māse māse sahassena, yo yajetha sataṃ samaṃ;
body.gathalast: Sāyeva pūjanā seyyo, yañce vassasataṃ hutaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo ca vassasataṃ jantu, aggiṃ paricare vane;
body.gathalast: Sāyeva pūjanā seyyo, yañce vassasataṃ hutaṃ.
Sabbampi taṃ na catubhāgameti, abhivādanā ujjugatesu seyyo.
Cattāro dhammā vaḍḍhanti, āyu vaṇṇo sukhaṃ balaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo ca vassasataṃ jīve, dussīlo asamāhito;
Yo ca vassasataṃ jīve, duppañño asamāhito;
Yo ca vassasataṃ jīve, kusīto hīnavīriyo;
Yo ca vassasataṃ jīve, apassaṃ udayabbayaṃ;
Yo ca vassasataṃ jīve, apassaṃ amataṃ padaṃ;
body.gathalast: Ekāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo, passato amataṃ padaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo ca vassasataṃ jīve, apassaṃ dhammamuttamaṃ;
